Class.name: Demo.PetSlow
Class.Description: PURPOSE: This class is almost exactly the same as Demo.Pet except it does not have bitmap indices.
To copy data from Demo.Pet, run: do ##class(Demo.PetSlow).CopyData()
Queries such as the one stated in the SQL QuickStart are usually slower when run against this class compared to Demo.Pet due to no bitmap indices.

Method.name: CopyData
Method.Description: This method copies data from Demo.Pet so both classes have the exact same data to show that bitmap indices improve performance
